      • drawSubPtm

        public void drawSubPtm(int offx,
              int offy,
              int w,
              int h,
              PTM ptm)
        This function updates the current PTM with the data of the given sub-ptm. The sub-ptm is stretched to the desired dimensions.
        Parameters:
        offx - Horizontal offset
        offy - Vertical offset
        w - Target width
        h - Target height
        ptm - Sub-ptm

      • drawSubPtm

        public void drawSubPtm(int offx,
              int offy,
              PTM ptm)
        This functions updates the current PTM with the data of the given sub-ptm.
        Parameters:
        offx - Horizontal offset
        offy - Vertical offset
        ptm - Sub-ptm

      • getCoefficients

        public int[][] getCoefficients()
        Get LRGBPTM coefficients. Coefficients are organized as follows: coefficients[i][0] --> coefficient a0 of the i-th pixel coefficients[i][1] --> coefficient a1 of the i-th pixel ... coefficients[i][5] --> coefficient a5 of the i-th pixel coefficients[i][6] --> RGB color encoded as 0x00RRGGBB
